name: CTHULHU: Frozen Nightmare
storyline:
Lovecraftian Space Harrier meets Ikaruga action game! 
 
Cthulhu waits dreaming... Until some bizarre cultists in the far north awaken him. Use your aircraft to put Cthulhu back into his icy slumber or die trying! 
 
Download for free: https://virtuaworlds.itch.io/cthulhu-frozen-nightmare
summary:
Free: https://virtuaworlds.itch.io/cthulhu-frozen-nightmare 
 
Cthulhu waits dreaming... Until some bizarre cultists in the far north awaken him. Use your aircraft to put Cthulhu back into his icy slumber or die trying! 
 
FEATURES: 
 
• INTENSE ARCADE STYLE ACTION 
 
• STORY INSPIRED BY H.P. LOVECRAFT 
 
• LO-FI RETRO INSPIRED AESTHETIC 
 
• SPACE HARRIER MEETS IKARUGA INSPIRED GAMEPLAY 
 
• ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK 
 
• KEYBOARD AND CONTROLLER SUPPORT
